short_summary: Request for Proposal (RFP) for external tailoring services for military uniform alterations.
description: PWGSC and the Department of National Defense (DND) are soliciting for tailoring services to perform military uniform alterations. Services will be performed in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Canada.
full_summary:
# [Invitation to Tender: Tailoring Services for Military Uniforms](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18478999?extsite=MTg0Nzg5OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Invitation Details

*   Invitation Title: R3380-23SB06
*   Invitation Type: Invitation to Tender
*   Invitation Date: January 11, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: February 5, 2024, 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

## Contracting Entity Information

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   Point of Contact: Renee-Ann Therien, [renee-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca][1]

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking external tailoring services to perform military uniform alterations in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada.

## Services to be Provided

The successful bidder will be required to procure and deliver high-quality tailoring services to alter military uniforms for the DND.

## Contract Period and Award Criteria

*   The contract is anticipated to begin on March 29, 2023, and will be awarded based on the lowest price criteria.

## Important Dates and Links

*   Tender Closing Date: February 5, 2024, 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
*   Invitation to Tender Document: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18478999?extsite=MTg0Nzg5OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18478999?extsite=MTg0Nzg5OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) reserves the right to modify or cancel this procurement at any time.

References:
[1]:  mailto:renee-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
